About us

50 unique performances crafted, with dozens of video projection solutions implemented.

Bringing dreams to life with multimedia show artistry. Our company doesn't just create content — we craft stories, turning 3D animation into captivating experiences that ignite the imagination.

More About Us

Our work

Our work is not only about vivid visual effects, but about independent works of art with their own mission and goals.

BAPCO BAPCO

3-minute multimedia performance, a contemporary dance, showing interaction of modern choreography with dynamic content on a projection grid

Nova Nova

Multimedia show | Interactive dance

Nova Nova

Hologram interaction dance for one of the best European TV Channels

Multimedia show - Google CEE Agency Summit 2019
